en.en_gw: Do you want to enable the public network gateway of router {0}?
en.diss_fip: Do you want to dissociate the Floating IP?
en.info_en_gw: Still need to bind a floating IP to a router or an instance before they can reachable from poublic network.
en.info_dis_gw: Router will not be able to reachable from public network after disable.
en.tip_dis_gw: Do you want to disable external gateway of router {0} ?

zh-CN.en_gw: 是否开启路由器{0}上的公网网关？
zh-CN.info_en_gw: 开启“公网网关”后还需要给路由或云主机绑定公网IP地址才能进行通信。
zh-CN.info_dis_gw: 关闭公网网关后路由器将不能与外部网络（公网）通信
zh-CN.tip_en_gw: 公网网关是路由器与外部网络（公网）通信的通道，开启公网网关让你的VDC内部具备与公网通信的能力。
zh-CN.tip_dis_gw: 是否关闭路由器{0}上的公网网关？
